title: Welding Clerk
cleaned_text: Welding Clerk Requisition ID: 271074 - Relocation Authorized: National - Camp - Telework Type: Full-Time Office/Project - Work Location: Karratha WA Bechtel Energy has an immediate opportunity for a Welding Clerk to be based in on-site at Pluto Train 2, Karratha. Pluto Train 2 is the expansion of a second LNG train at the existing Pluto LNG onshore facility near Karratha in Western Australia run by Woodside Energy. Woodside Energy is Australia's leading natural gas producer, and Bechtel is excited to be working with this key customer to help meet the increasing global demand for LNG as a transitional energy source. There are many reasons why choosing to join Bechtel is one of the best career decisions you will ever make. In addition to working with talented, dedicated people and having the opportunity to play an integral role in stimulating and challenging local and international projects, Bechtel is committed to offering you the benefits and resources to live a healthy life. With a market aligned salary package and annual discretionary performance bonus scheme in place, employee wellbeing is also at the centre of our business - promoted through our strong health and safety focus and private health cover including access to a leading employee assistance program. What you will bring: In your new role as the Welding Clerk, you will report to the Lead Field Welding Engineer and provide support to experienced construction engineering personnel by performing routine Welding Data inputs and Welding Document Control retention assignments. You will perform administrative tasks and use drawings and specifications in daily work, completing assigned tasks under close supervision and technical direction. It will be your role to maintain welder testing records as well as Permanent Plant welds for quantities and construction welding inspection reports. About you: As Welding Clerk, you are required to have basic experience of welding and NDE document control procedures, with knowledge of materials and weld techniques preferred. You will have basic safety awareness programs and safety compliance with excellent attention to detail and good communication skills. With an understanding of Microsoft Word, Outlook and Excel, you will have the ability to develop working knowledge of Teamworks, E-track and WITS databases. Please note, Right to Work in Australia without employer sponsorship is required for this role. Additional Information This position has responsibilities that include exposure to changing environmental, construction, and operational conditions, which may include: extensive walking in and around an active construction and/or operations site, climbing ladders, working at heights from work platforms including scaffolding, and mobile elevating work platforms (MEWPs), use of personal fall arrest equipment, walking and working on uneven surfaces, working in constricted and/or confined spaces, variable work shifts (e.g., day, night, weekends, 1st, 2nd, 3rd shift, etc.), and work in inclement weather. Some lifting may be required. Candidate must be able to use standard issued Personal Protection Equipment (PPE) required for each assigned task (i.e. respirator, harness, life vest, hearing protection, etc.). The Pluto Train 2 Project is a Major Hazard Facility meaning this is a non-smoking site and no tobacco products - i.e. cigarettes, vapes, lighters, tobacco - are permitted to be brought to the site Why Choose Bechtel?
